steps.instruction: To search for a patient record, select the Client, Facility, and Patient Indicators.
Once the patient record(s) are displayed, double-click the appropriate record to select it.
Upload the patient identification documents, if available. Accepted forms include a driver's license or passport.
Make any necessary changes to the patient's information.
Press Save and Next to continue.
Please review the patient's insurance information for accuracy and completeness. Add any missing details or update outdated/incorrect information as needed.
Upload the patient's health insurance card, if available. Include both the front and back of the card.
Press Save and Next to continue.
Search for the Ordering Physician by name or NPI.Press Save and Next to continue.
If appropriate, enter the patient's unit, room, and bed location. Press Save and Next to continue.
To order a service, click on the + Add Order Item button and enter the required information.
You have the option to submit a recurring order or order items.
To make the entire order recurring, check the Repeat Order box and input the frequency and order end date.
To make a specific service or services recurring, in the order item section, check the Recurring box and input the frequency and order end date.
Click on the green icon to save the order item, or click on the red delete icon to remove it from the order. Repeat these steps for each additional service.
Once all order items have been added, click on Save and Preview to view your order summary. You will have the option to return to this screen to make changes prior to submitting your order.
Click on Attach Document to upload the ordering physician's prescription order. Acceptable file formats are png, jpg, jpeg, and pdf, with a maximum file size of 20 MB.
To add a new client record, click the "Add Client" button and enter the required information.
To view or modify an existing client record, double-click the desired client row in the table.
To view or modify facility assignments, double-click the Client Name hyperlink.
After making changes, click "Save" to update the client record and continue.
View CPT codes along with their descriptions and the services associated with each CPT.
To assign a new facility to the selected client, click the "Add Facility" button and enter the required information.
To view or modify an existing facility record, double-click the desired facility row in the table.
After completing any updates, click "Save" to confirm and continue.
Select a Client and Facility to view the list of associated patient records. If the patient record is not found, click the "Add Patient" button, enter the required information, and click "Save".
To modify patient details, double-click on the desired patient record. After making changes, click "Save" to update the record and continue.
To view additional patient demographics, double-click on the Patient Number hyperlink. Double-click on any row to view the history of changes made.
To add a new service category, click the "Add Service Type" button and enter the required information.
To view or modify an existing service category, double-click on the desired row in the table.
To add or modify detailed services for each category, click on the Service Name hyperlink.
To add a new service, click the "Add Service Detail" button and enter the required information.
To view or modify an existing service, double-click on the desired row in the table.
To add a new cpt, click the "Add CPT" button and enter the required information.
To view or modify an existing cpt, double-click on the desired row in the table.
To view an order, double-click on the Order Number.
To modify an order, click on the edit icon in the Action column.
To view an order, double-click on the Order Number.
To add a scheduled appointment date to the order, click the "Schedule Order" button.
To add a cancel date for the order, double-click on the Order Number and add the cancellation reason to complete the record.
To view an order, double-click on the Order Number.
To view an order, double-click on the Order Number.
To cancel an order, click the "Cancel Order" button. You may cancel an order for any reason up to 48 hours prior to the scheduled appointment date.
Double-click on a cancelled order to view the order contents.
For each client facility, assign a list of services provided at or by that facility.
After selecting the client, double-click on the facility name to view the list of services associated with the selected facility.
To add a new service record, click the "Add Service" button and enter the required information.
To view or modify an existing record, double-click the desired row in the table. After making changes, click "Save" to update the list of services assigned to the selected facility.
Click the “Manage Availability” button to create a new availability record and fill in the required information.
Select the appropriate weekday and specify the start and end time for which the service should be available.
You can add multiple availability slots for the same day if the service operates in separate time frames.
To update an existing record, click on the relevant entry and modify the details as needed.
Use the delete option to remove an availability slot that is no longer required.
Click the Save button after creating or updating availability to ensure your changes are applied.
